hotelsystem.controller

Class RoomStatusController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelsystem.controller.DatabaseController
      • hotelsystem.controller.RoomStatusController

  • public class RoomStatusController
extends DatabaseController
    Description of Room Status Controller Controls individual Room Status To display, saving, loading of Room Status List to the Database
    Since:
    17/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kenneth Yak Yong Seng, Kan Kah Seng
